segments.text: Don't mention it . The thesis due date is coming , but my thesis isn't even close to being done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've finished the first draft , but the professor said it's poorly written . I have to rewrite it . it's so depressing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . Anyway , you are better than me .
segments.speaker: S2
